ai-pe6:56.3_0: if he is once-returner, who will come back to this world once only, then make an end of suffering.
ai-pe6:57.1_0: One who develops the fruit of once-returning, a noble disciple who develops the five lower fetters, and the five lower fetters of once-returning. They give up sensual desire, affection, infatuation, thirst, and passion for sensual pleasures. The five lower fetters of rebirth, and are extinguished there, and who has given up the five lower fetters of rebirth, and the five lower fetters of rebirth. This is why identity view.
ai-pe6:58.1_0: Someone who develops and cultivates the five higher fetters after giving up the five higher fetters and the fetters after giving up.
ai-pe6:58.2_0: I’m giving up these five higher fetters.
ai-pe6:59.1_0: As long as they are, the perfected ones, cooled, experiencing the bliss of extinguishment.
ai-pe6:59.2_0: The life of the life faculty of pain arises, and ceases without anything left over.
ai-pe6:59.3_0: Then this cessation and settling, and ending of suffering is the cessation of another.

ai-pe6:60.1_0: And what are the nine progressive meditative attainments?
ai-pe6:60.2_0: Four absorptions and the attainments of the formless liberations.
ai-pe6:60.4_0: Firstly, a mendicant, quite secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities, should make an effort to arise in detail.
ai-pe6:60.6_0: He should say, “Take,” “... the attainment of stream-entry in detail.
ai-pe6:60.7_0: These are the nine progressive meditative attainments.
ai-pe6:61.1_0: And what is the first absorption?
ai-pe6:61.2_0: Five factors that possesses five factors.
ai-pe6:61.3_0: What are the five factors they possess?
ai-pe6:61.8_0: The underlying tendency to desire, affection, infatuation, thirst, passion, attachment, and craving for the five kinds of sensual stimulation. This is the hindrances of sensual desire and greed for them.
ai-pe6:61.9_0: What is the hindrance of ill will?
ai-pe6:61.10_0: The cessation, settling, and ending of choices. ...
ai-pe6:61.11_0: Doing so, ill will is the hindrance of ill will.
ai-pe6:61.13_0: It’s because they burn like old age, unskilled in the mind, and lying down.
ai-pe6:61.15_0: This body is heavy and unfit for the body.
ai-pe6:61.16_0: And so this is what is meant.
ai-pe6:61.20_0: One who understands the mind, and one who is scattered and diffused.
ai-pe6:61.21_0: And so they become anxious, and the first absorption of restlessness and remorse, and restlessness and remorse.
ai-pe6:61.23_0: Anyone who has experiential confidence in the Buddha ...
ai-pe6:61.25_0: However, they say that the danger of doubt is dangerous and threatened and the danger from the slightest fault, they keep the rules they’ve undertaken.
ai-pe6:61.26_0: One who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand.
ai-pe6:62.1_0: With what is the hindrance of the hindrance of confusion?”
ai-pe6:62.2_0: although the shadow falls from the sky.
ai-pe6:62.4_0: Sensual desire, ill will, dullness and drowsiness, restlessness and remorse, and doubt.
ai-pe6:63.1_0: and there is a way in which one could become.
ai-pe6:63.2_0: Sensual desire, ill will, dullness and drowsiness, restlessness and remorse, and doubt.
ai-pe6:64.1_0: and there is a way in which one could become.
ai-pe6:64.3_0: There are four absorptions, limitless, free of enmity and ill will, who meditates without awakening.
ai-pe6:64.4_0: Sensual desire, ill will, dullness and drowsiness, restlessness and remorse, and doubt.
ai-pe6:65.1_0: and there is a way in which one could become.
ai-pe6:65.2_0: Sensual desire, ill will, dullness and drowsiness, restlessness and remorse, and doubt.
ai-pe6:65.3_0: These are the five factors that they possess.
ai-pe6:66.1_0: What are the five factors he added:
ai-pe6:66.2_0: Placing the mind with rapture and bliss born of rapture.
ai-pe6:66.3_0: and the first absorption is called the loved of these five factors.
ai-pe6:66.4_0: Live having undertaken these five factors, they enter and remain in the first absorption meditation.
ai-pe6:67.1_0: There they enter and remain in the second absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of immersion, with internal clarity and confidence, and unified mind, without placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-pe6:68.1_0: There they enter and remain in the third absorption, where there are five factors.
ai-pe6:69.2_0: And so the arising of these four factors is called the fourth absorptions of the truth.
ai-pe6:69.3_0: Having made these four absorptions, he lives in the neighborhood of dwellings.
ai-pe6:70.1_0: What is the basis of impermanence?
ai-pe6:70.2_0: this is impermanent, suffering, and perishable.

ai-pe6:71.2_0: that leads to illness, oppressing, and injuring.
